title: Axis Bank and Mastercard collaborate to launch credit card for small business owners
description: Axis Bank and Mastercard have teamed up to launch MyBiz, a business credit card tailored for sole proprietors and small business owners. The card offers various business and travel benefits, including airport lounge access, travel insurance, and access to business-related services. This collaboration aims to enhance the financial experience of SME owners in India.
